4eb4e801424a47f7b77434291921f889.title: ESA Ozone Climate Change Initiative (Ozone CCI): Level 3 Nadir Ozone Profile Merged Data Product, version 2

variables.name: surface_pressure
variables.long_name: Pressure at the bottom of the atmosphere.

variables.name: O3e_ndens
variables.long_name: error in the weighted average of the number density (#molecules/cm3)

variables.name: O3e_du
variables.long_name: error in the weighted average of the partial ozone columns (DU/layer)

variables.name: O3e_vmr
variables.long_name: error in the weighted average of the volume mixing ratio (ppmv)

variables.name: lat
variables.long_name: latitude, from -90 (south) to +90 (north) given at gridcell centers

variables.name: lon
variables.long_name: longitude, from -180 (west) to +180 (east) given at gridcell centers

variables.name: O3e_du_tot
variables.long_name: total column error: quadratically added o3e_du (DU)

variables.name: O3_du_tot
variables.long_name: total column: vertically integrated O3_du dataset (DU)

variables.name: O3_ndens
variables.long_name: weighted average of the number density (#molecules/cm3)

variables.name: O3_du
variables.long_name: weighted average of the partial ozone columns (DU/layer)

variables.name: O3_vmr
variables.long_name: weighted average of the volume mixing ratio (ppmv)

915d2340b178494f987a6942e263a2eb.title: ESA Ocean Colour Climate Change Initiative (Ocean_Colour_cci): Global chlorophyll-a data products gridded on a sinusoidal projection, Version 3.1

variables.name: chlor_a_log10_bias
variables.long_name: Bias of log10-transformed chlorophyll-a concentration in seawater.

variables.name: chlor_a
variables.long_name: Chlorophyll-a concentration in seawater (not log-transformed), generated by SeaDAS using a blended combination of OCI (OC4v6 + Hu's CI), OC3 and OC5, depending on water class memberships

variables.name: MERIS_nobs
variables.long_name: Count of the number of observations from the MERIS sensor contributing to this bin cell

variables.name: MODISA_nobs
variables.long_name: Count of the number of observations from the MODIS (Aqua) sensor contributing to this bin cell

variables.name: SeaWiFS_nobs
variables.long_name: Count of the number of observations from the SeaWiFS (GAC and LAC) sensor contributing to this bin cell

variables.name: VIIRS_nobs
variables.long_name: Count of the number of observations from the VIIRS sensor contributing to this bin cell

variables.name: total_nobs
variables.long_name: Count of the total number of observations contributing to this bin cell

variables.name: chlor_a_log10_rmsd
variables.long_name: Root-mean-square-difference of log10-transformed chlorophyll-a concentration in seawater.

3ef6a5a66e9947d39b356251909dc12b.title: ESA Sea State Climate Change Initiative (Sea_State_cci) : Global remote sensing daily merged multi-mission along-track significant wave height, L3 product, version 1.1

variables.name: swh_adjusted
variables.long_name: Ku band adjusted significant wave height

variables.name: swh_denoised
variables.long_name: Ku band denoised significant wave height

variables.name: swh_uncertainty
variables.long_name: best estimate of significant wave height standard error

variables.name: relative_pass_number
variables.long_name: relative pass number of satellite associated with measurement

variables.name: cycle_number
variables.long_name: relative pass number of satellite associated with measurement

variables.name: cycle
variables.long_name: relative pass number of satellite associated with measurement

83e51cf29821434ea14db56c564946d5.title: ESA Sea Surface Temperature Climate Change Initiative (SST_cci): Climatology Climate Data Record, version 2.1

a6efcb0868664248b9cb212aba44313d.title: ESA Aerosol Climate Change Initiative (Aerosol CCI): Level 2 aerosol products from MERIS (ALAMO algorithm), Version 2.2

variables.name: icolumn
variables.long_name: Column number of the pixel in the original grid

variables.name: pixel_number
variables.long_name: Indice of the pixel in the vector of observations

variables.name: iline
variables.long_name: Line number of the pixel in the original grid

variables.name: AOD550
variables.long_name: Mean Effective Aerosol Optical Thickness at 550nm over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: AOD865
variables.long_name: Mean Effective Aerosol Optical Thickness at 865nm over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: R_eff
variables.long_name: Mean Effective Radius over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: fAOD550
variables.long_name: Mean Fine Mode Aerosol Optical Thickness at 550nm over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: fAOD865
variables.long_name: Mean Fine Mode Aerosol Optical Thickness at 865nm over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: AOD550_std
variables.long_name: Standard Deviation of Effective Aerosol Optical Thickness at 550nm over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: AOD865_std
variables.long_name: Standard Deviation of Effective Aerosol Optical Thickness at 865nm over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: R_eff_std
variables.long_name: Standard Deviation of Effective Radius over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: fAOD550_std
variables.long_name: Standard Deviation of Fine Mode Aerosol Optical Thickness at 550nm over ocean - Best solution

variables.name: fAOD865_std
variables.long_name: Standard Deviation of Fine Mode Aerosol Optical Thickness at 865nm over ocean - Best solution
